text: Billy Pardon (25 September 1903 – 17 November 1969) was an Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Billy Pardon's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1903 births Category:1969 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players
title: Billy Pardon
